mapper.select: select tu.* from top_user tu order by tu.id
select tu.* from top_user tu where tu.id = #{parentId}
select tu.* from top_user tu where tu.id = #{id} for update

select tu.grade, tu.invited_code, (select _tu.wallet from top_user _tu where _tu.id = tu.invited_user_id) as invitedUserWallet, (select count(_tui.id) from top_user_invite _tui where _tui.user_id = tu.id and _tui.level = 10) as totalInviteUser, (select ifnull(sum(_tpsi.income),0) from top_power_sharing_income _tpsi where _tpsi.user_id = tu.id) as totalPowerIncome from top_user tu where tu.wallet = #{wallet}

select i_tu.grade, i_tu.wallet, i_tu.create_time, (select ifnull(sum(_tpo.amount),0) from top_power_order _tpo where _tpo.user_id = i_tu.id) as power from top_user i_tu inner join top_user_invite tui on i_tu.id = tui.invite_user_id where tui.user_id = #{userId} and tui.level <= 10 order by i_tu.create_time

select (select count(_tui.id) from top_user_invite _tui where _tui.user_id = tu.id and _tui.level = 1) as totalInviteUser, (select ifnull(sum(_tat.amount),0) from top_account_tx _tat where _tat.tx_type = 'STORE_INTEREST' and _tat.user_id = tu.id) as totalStoreIncome from top_user tu where tu.wallet = #{wallet}

select i_tu.grade, i_tu.wallet, (select ifnull(sum(_tso.invest_amount),0) from top_store_order _tso where _tso.user_id = i_tu.id) as investAmount from top_user i_tu inner join top_user_invite tui on i_tu.id = tui.invite_user_id where tui.user_id = #{userId} and tui.level = 1 order by i_tu.create_time
